title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2014 - Sibiu, Romania
description:
For all of you who appreciate clean code, TDD, pair programming, we are pleased to invite you to a session of code retreat. 
The event will be organized by Csaba Trucza in iQuest office in Sibiu. 
More information about code retreat can be found here (http://agileworks.ro/code-retreat/) 
To help us in organizing the event, those willing to participate, please confirm at adrian.barglazan@iquestgroup.com. 
 
The structure for the event will be according with: 
http://archive.coderetreat.org/facilitating/structure-of-a-coderetreat
